Detailed Description

This extension of Plot permits interactive readout of xvalue, yvalue positions on the plot. Mouse motion over the plot calls the registered ReadoutListeners, giving them the position information.

To be notified when this occurs, create an object that implements the ReadoutListener interface and add that listener using addReadoutListener().

Parameters:
